content:
Skills identify your agents' areas of expertise. When you assign an agent to a skill, that agent receives chat requests related to the agent's skill areas.

Available in: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience, Performance Editions, Developer Edition orgs created after June 14, 2012, Essentials, Unlimited, and Enterprise Editions with Service Cloud or Sales Cloud.

USER PERMISSIONS
NEEDED
To create skills:	Customize Application
To assign skills (supervisors):	Assign Chat Skills to Users OR Customize Application

The legacy chat product is scheduled for retirement on February 14, 2026. Before assigning a user or profile to a skill or removing a user or profile from a skill, chat must be enabled.

To create a new skill:
From Setup, enter Skills in the Quick Find box.
Click New.
Enter a name for the skill.
In the Assign Users area, select users to associate with the skill.
In the Assign Profiles area, select profiles to associate with the skill.
Click Save.
title: Assigning Chat Skills to Users
